name: Lowcountry Shrimp and Grits
author: kit kat zebb
summary: This is a Charleston, South Carolina recipe. It is a combination of all the best recipes I have seen, and similar to a dish that is served in a popular Downtown Charleston restaurant.
ingredients: ⅛ cup extra virgin olive oil
directions: In a medium saucepan, bring the milk to a boil
Stir in the grits, and reduce heat to low
Cook, stirring occasionally, until silky, about 10 minutes
Meanwhile, heat olive oil and butter in a skillet over medium heat
Saute onions until tender, then toss in shrimp
Season with salt and pepper, and cook 4 to 5 minutes, or until shrimp turn pink
Stir shrimp mixture into grits, and continue cooking for 10 to 15 minutes
